mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(mslsi.*) FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO mslsi INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK_ADSTDG_MPPG cgslam ON mslsi.LINK_ID = cgslam.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1

SELECT mslsi.ANLS_DT , mslsi.SPEED , mslsi.TRFVLM , cgslam.ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO mslsi INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK_ADSTDG_MPPG cgslam ON mslsi.LINK_ID = cgslam.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY mslsi.ANLS_DT DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 10

SELECT DISTINCT MSLSI.ANLS_DT AS "anlsDt", MSLSI.LINK_ID AS "linkId", MSLSI.SPEED AS "speed", MSLSI.TRFVLM AS "trfvlm", MSLSI.ETL_DT AS "etlDt", GCIL.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName", GCIL.ROAD_RANK AS "roadRank" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK GCIL ON MSLSI.LINK_ID = GCIL.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1
AND MSLSI.ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY MSLSI.TRFVLM DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DISTINCT MSLSI.ANLS_DT AS "anlsDt", MSLSI.LINK_ID AS "linkId", MSLSI.SPEED AS "speed", MSLSI.TRFVLM AS "trfvlm", MSLSI.ETL_DT AS "etlDt", GCIL.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName", GCIL.ROAD_RANK AS "roadRank",
CASE WHEN (GCIL.ROAD_RANK = '101' AND 0 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 30) OR (GCIL.ROAD_RANK = '102' AND 0 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 30) OR ((GCIL.ROAD_RANK != '101'AND GCIL.ROAD_RANK != '102') AND 0 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 20) THEN '3' WHEN (GCIL.ROAD_RANK = '101' AND 30 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 70) OR (GCIL.ROAD_RANK = '102' AND 30 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 50) OR ((GCIL.ROAD_RANK != '101'AND GCIL.ROAD_RANK != '102') AND 20 <= MSLSI.SPEED AND MSLSI.SPEED < 40) THEN '2' ELSE '1'
END AS "delayStts" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK GCIL ON MSLSI.LINK_ID = GCIL.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1
AND MSLSI.ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY "delayStts" DESC , MSLSI.TRFVLM DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT MSLSI.LINK_ID ,MSLSI.ANLS_DT ,AVG(SPEED) AS AVG_VHCL_SPEED_AVG ,SUM(TRFVLM) AS VHCL_TRFVLM_TOTAL ,ST_ASGEOJSON(ST_LINEMERGE(GCIL.GEOMETRY)) AS GEOJSON ,GCIL.ROAD_RANK ,GCIL.ROAD_NAME ,GCIL.ROAD_TYPE FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK GCIL ON MSLSI.LINK_ID = GCIL.LINK_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(MSLSI.ANLS_DT) AS RCT_ANLS_DT ,MSLSI.LINK_ID FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI GROUP BY MSLSI.LINK_ID ) RCT ON RCT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID AND RCT.RCT_ANLS_DT = MSLSI.ANLS_DT GROUP BY MSLSI.LINK_ID, MSLSI.ANLS_DT,GCIL.ROAD_RANK , GCIL.ROAD_NAME , GCIL.ROAD_TYPE,GEOJSON

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM DESC) AS rownum, AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM AS "totalCnt", AVCI.ROAD_NAME as "roadName" FROM( SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS TOTAL_TRFVLM, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE MSLSI.ANLS_DT >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{beforeTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') AND MSLSI.ANLS_DT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID ) AVCI ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM DESC) AS rownum, AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM AS "totalCnt", AVCI.ROAD_NAME as "roadName" FROM( SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS TOTAL_TRFVLM, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(NOW()::DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY CGSLT.ROAD_NAME ) AVCI ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_TRFVLM DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_AVG_SPEED DESC) AS rownum, AVCI.TOTAL_AVG_SPEED AS "totalCnt", AVCI.ROAD_NAME as "roadName" FROM( SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(MSLSI.SPEED),0),0) AS TOTAL_AVG_SPEED, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE MSLSI.ANLS_DT >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{beforeTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') AND MSLSI.ANLS_DT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID ) AVCI ORDER BY AVCI.TOTAL_AVG_SPEED DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT RESULT_DATA.ANLS_DT AS "anlsDt", RESULT_DATA.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName", SUM(RESULT_DATA.TOTAL_CNT) AS "totalCnt" FROM ( SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS TOTAL_CNT, TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') || 'ì‹œ~' || TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT + INTERVAL '1 hours', 'HH24') || 'ì‹œ' AS ANLS_DT, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') = #{schTime}
AND CGSLT.ROAD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schRoadName} || '%'
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID,MSLSI.ANLS_DT ) RESULT_DATA GROUP BY RESULT_DATA.ANLS_DT,RESULT_DATA.ROAD_NAME ORDER BY SUM(RESULT_DATA.TOTAL_CNT) DESC
LIMIT 5 OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 5

SELECT COUNT(RESULT_DATA.*) FROM ( SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS TOTAL_CNT, TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') AS ANLS_DT, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') = #{schTime}
AND CGSLT.ROAD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schRoadName} || '%'
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID,TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') ) RESULT_DATA

SELECT RESULT_DATA.ANLS_DT AS "anlsDt", RESULT_DATA.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName", ROUND(AVG(RESULT_DATA.TOTAL_CNT),2) AS "totalCnt" FROM ( SELECT ROUND(AVG(MSLSI.SPEED),2) AS TOTAL_CNT, TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') || 'ì‹œ~' || TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT + INTERVAL '1 hours', 'HH24') || 'ì‹œ' AS ANLS_DT, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') = #{schTime}
AND CGSLT.ROAD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schRoadName} || '%'
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID,MSLSI.ANLS_DT ) RESULT_DATA GROUP BY RESULT_DATA.ANLS_DT,RESULT_DATA.ROAD_NAME ORDER BY RESULT_DATA.ANLS_DT DESC
LIMIT 5 OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 5

SELECT COUNT(RESULT_DATA.*) FROM ( SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS TOTAL_CNT, TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') AS ANLS_DT, CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON CGSLT.LINK_ID = MSLSI.LINK_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{currentTime},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') = #{schTime}
AND CGSLT.ROAD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schRoadName} || '%'
GROUP BY CGSLT.LINK_ID,TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') ) RESULT_DATA

SELECT TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') AS hours, SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS cnt FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY hours ORDER BY hours ASC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TRFVLM),0) AS "CNT" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT SUM(MSLSI.TRFVLM) AS "trfvlm" , CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI LEFT JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON MSLSI.LINK_ID = CGSLT.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by CGSLT.ROAD_NAME ORDER BY TRFVLM DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(SPEED),0) AS "SPEED" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT TO_CHAR(MSLSI.ANLS_DT, 'HH24') AS hours, ROUND(AVG(MSLSI.SPEED)) AS cnt FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY hours ORDER BY hours ASC

SELECT round(AVG(MSLSI.SPEED),0) AS "speed" , CGSLT.ROAD_NAME AS "roadName" FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI LEFT JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK CGSLT ON MSLSI.LINK_ID = CGSLT.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by CGSLT.ROAD_NAME ORDER BY SPEED DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT LINK_ID, SUM(TRFVLM) AS TRFVLM FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI WHERE MSLSI.ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' '||#{time}||':00:00', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' '||#{time}||':59:59', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY LINK_ID ORDER BY TRFVLM DESC

SELECT LINK_ID, ROUND(AVG(SPEED),0) AS SPEED FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO MSLSI WHERE MSLSI.ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' '||#{time}||':00:00', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' '||#{time}||':59:59', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY LINK_ID ORDER BY SPEED DESC

SELECT LINK_ID, SUM(TRFVLM) AS TRFVLM, ROUND(AVG(SPEED),2) AS SPEED FROM MRT_STD_LINK_SECTN_INFO
AND LINK_ID = #{linkId}
AND ANLS_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' 00:00:00', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY LINK_ID ORDER BY TRFVLM DESC ,SPEED DESC
